verses.verse: Now while Ezra<WH5830> was praying<WH6419> and making<WH3034> confession,<WH3034> weeping<WH1058> and prostrating<WH5307> himself before<WH6440> the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> a very<WH3966> large<WH7227> assembly,<WH6951> men,<WH376> women,<WH802> and children,<WH3206> gathered<WH6908> to him from Israel;<WH3478> for the people<WH5971> wept<WH1058> bitterly.<WH7235> <WH1059>

And Shecaniah<WH7935> the son<WH1121> of Jehiel,<WH3171> one of the sons<WH1121> of Elam,<WH9405> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to Ezra,<WH5830> "We have been<WH4603> unfaithful<WH4603> to our God,<WH430> and have married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> women<WH802> from the peoples<WH5971> of the land;<WH776> yet now<WH6258> there<WH3426> is hope<WH4723> for Israel<WH3478> in spite<WH5921> of this.<WH2088>

"So now<WH6258> let us make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with our God<WH430> to put<WH3318> away<WH3318> all<WH3605> the wives<WH802> and their children,<WH3205> according to the counsel<WH6098> of my lord<WH136> and of those who tremble<WH2730> at the commandment<WH4687> of our God;<WH430> and let it be done<WH6213> according to the law.<WH8451>
"Arise!<WH6965> For [this] matter<WH1697> is your responsibility,<WH5921> but we will be with you; be courageous<WH2388> and act.<WH6213>"

Then Ezra<WH5830> rose<WH6965> and made the leading<WH8269> priests,<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> and all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> take<WH7650> oath<WH7650> that they would do<WH6213> according to this<WH2088> proposal;<WH1697> so they took<WH7650> the oath.<WH7650>

Then Ezra<WH5830> rose<WH6965> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> the house<WH1004> of God<WH430> and went<WH1980> into the chamber<WH3957> of Jehohanan<WH3076> the son<WH1121> of Eliashib.<WH475> Although he went<WH1980> there,<WH8033> he did not eat<WH398> bread,<WH3899> nor<WH3808> drink<WH8354> water,<WH4325> for he was mourning<WH56> over<WH5921> the unfaithfulness<WH4604> of the exiles.<WH1473>
And they made<WH5674> a proclamation<WH6963> throughout Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389> to all<WH3605> the exiles,<WH1121> <WH1473> that they should assemble<WH6908> at Jerusalem,<WH3389>

and that whoever<WH3605> <WH834> would not come<WH935> within three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> according to the counsel<WH6098> of the leaders<WH8269> and the elders,<WH2205> all<WH3605> his possessions<WH7399> should be forfeited<WH2763> and he himself<WH1931> excluded<WH914> from the assembly<WH6951> of the exiles.<WH1473>

So all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063> and Benjamin<WH1144> assembled<WH6908> at Jerusalem<WH3389> within the three<WH7969> days.<WH3117> It was the ninth<WH8671> month<WH2320> on the twentieth<WH6242> of the month,<WH2320> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> sat<WH3427> in the open<WH7339> square<WH7339> [before] the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> trembling<WH7460> because<WH5921> of this matter<WH1697> and the heavy rain.<WH1653>

Then Ezra<WH5830> the priest<WH3548> stood<WH6965> up and said<WH559> to them, "You have been<WH4603> unfaithful<WH4603> and have married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> wives<WH802> adding<WH3254> to the guilt<WH819> of Israel.<WH3478>

"Now,<WH6258> therefore, make<WH5414> confession<WH8426> to the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of your fathers, and do<WH1> His will;<WH6213> and separate<WH7522> yourselves from the peoples<WH914> of the land<WH5971> and from the foreign<WH776> wives.<WH5237>"
Then all<WH3605> the assembly<WH6951> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> with a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> "That's right!<WH9210> As you have said,<WH1697> so it is our duty<WH5921> to do.<WH6213>

"But there are many<WH7227> people,<WH5971> it is the rainy<WH1653> season,<WH6256> and we are not able<WH3581> to stand<WH5975> in the open.<WH2351> Nor<WH3808> [can] the task<WH4399> [be done] in one<WH259> or two<WH8147> days,<WH3117> for we have transgressed<WH6586> greatly<WH7235> in this<WH2088> matter.<WH1697>

"Let our leaders<WH8269> represent<WH5975> the whole<WH3605> assembly<WH6951> and let all<WH3605> those in our cities<WH5892> who have married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> wives<WH802> come<WH935> at appointed<WH2163> times,<WH6256> together<WH5973> with the elders<WH2205> and judges<WH8199> of each<WH5892> city,<WH5892> until<WH5704> the fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639> of our God<WH430> on account<WH5704> of this<WH2088> matter<WH1697> is turned<WH7725> away<WH7725> from us."

Only<WH389> Jonathan<WH3083> the son<WH1121> of Asahel<WH6214> and Jahzeiah<WH3167> the son<WH1121> of Tikvah<WH8616> opposed<WH5975> this,<WH2088> with Meshullam<WH4918> and Shabbethai<WH7678> the Levite<WH3881> supporting<WH5826> them.

But the exiles<WH1121> <WH1473> did<WH6213> so.<WH3651> And Ezra<WH5830> the priest<WH3548> selected<WH914> men<WH376> [who were] heads<WH7218> of fathers' [households<WH1004>] for [each of] their father's households, all<WH3605> of them by name.<WH8034> So they convened<WH3427> on the first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the tenth<WH6224> month<WH2320> to investigate<WH1875> the matter.<WH1697>
And they finished<WH3615> [investigating] all<WH3605> the men<WH376> who had married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> wives<WH802> by the first<WH259> of the first<WH7223> month.<WH2320>

And among<WH4480> the sons<WH1121> of the priests<WH3548> who<WH834> had married<WH3427> foreign<WH5237> wives<WH802> were found<WH4672> of the sons<WH1121> of Jeshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Jozadak,<WH3087> and his brothers:<WH251> Maaseiah,<WH4641> Eliezer,<WH461> Jarib,<WH3402> and Gedaliah.<WH1436>
And they pledged<WH5414> <WH3027> to put<WH3318> away<WH3318> their wives,<WH802> and being guilty,<WH818> [they offered] a ram<WH352> of the flock<WH6629> for their offense.<WH818>
And of the sons<WH1121> of Immer<WH564> [there were] Hanani<WH2607> and Zebadiah;<WH2069>
and of the sons<WH1121> of Harim:<WH2766> Maaseiah,<WH4641> Elijah,<WH452> Shemaiah,<WH8098> Jehiel,<WH3171> and Uzziah;<WH5818>

And of Levites<WH3881> [there were] Jozabad,<WH3107> Shimei,<WH8096> Kelaiah<WH7041> (that is, Kelita<WH7042>), Pethahiah,<WH6611> Judah,<WH3063> and Eliezer.<WH461>
